document.title: Hot Topic: Reminder of Stage 2 Disinfectants and Disinfection Byproducts Rule
document.abstract: The rule applies to any community or nontransient, noncommunity water system that adds or delivers water that is treated with a primary or residual disinfectant other than ultraviolet light.
